short.ar: يمكن لهذه الإضافة تبديل وكيل المستخدم لمستعرض الإنترنت ، كما تمكنك من العثور على جميع عناوين HTTP.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,el,en,en_AU,en_US,es,es_4: This extension can switch the user agent of a browser. and it allows you to find all HTTP URLs.
short.da: Denne udvidelse kan skifte bruger agent for en browser. og det giver dig mulighed for at finde alle HTTP URL'er.
short.de: Diese Erweiterung kann den User Agent des Browser wechseln und ermöglicht Dir alle HTTP-URL's aufzurufen.
short.en_GB: This extension can switch the browser's user agent string and it allows you to find all HTTP URLs.
short.fi: Tämä laajennus voi vaihtaa käyttäjä agentti selaimen. ja sen avulla voit löytää kaikki HTTP URL.
short.fr: Cette extension peut basculer l'User Agent d'un navigateur web et vous permet de trouver toutes les URLs HTTP.
short.he: תוסף זה יכול להחליף את סוכן המשתמש של דפדפן. וזה מאפשר לך למצוא את כל כתובות אתרי HTTP.
short.hu: Ezzel a kiterjesztéssel megváltoztathatja böngészője User Agent beállításait, illetve megtekintheti az összes HTTP URL-t
short.it: Questa estensione può cambiare l'user agent di un browser, e ti permette di trovare tutti gli indirizzi HTTP
short.ja: この拡張機能は、ブラウザのUser Agentを切り替えることができます。
short.ko: 크롬 브라우저 User Agent를 여러가지로 변경할 수 있도록 해줍니다. 그리고 크롬에서 전송되는 HTTP URL을 확인할 수 있습니다.
short.nl: Deze extensie kan de user agent van een browser veranderen. Ook kan je hiermee alle HTTP URLs vinden.
short.no: Denne utvidelsen kan bytte user agent av en nettleser. og det kan du finne alle HTTP-URLer.
short.pl: Rozszerzenie to może przełączyć User Agenta w przeglądarce. i pozwala znaleźć wszystkie URLe HTTP.
short.ru: Это расширение может переключать User Agent браузера. и это позволяет найти все HTTP URL.
short.sr: Овај додатак може да промени кориснички агент прегледача. Омогућава вам и да пронађете све HTTP URL адресе.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Most web pages are fully and completely compatible with Chrome. 
However, there are some sites that insist upon using a different browser. 
So, an extension has been developed for Chrome called the Ultimate User Agent Switcher.

When a web page suggests using a different browser or upgrading the current one, 
the Ultimate User Agent Switcher tricks the web site into believing that it is a different browser, often allowing access.

And this extension allows you to find all HTTP URLs. (URL sniffer feature)
This extension supports Chrome 18 and later.

*Enable,disable switcher
*Add,edit User Agent list
*Filters to apply
*URL pattern to apply
*View URL sniffer log (type,method,URL,original HTTP headers..)
*Export/Import settings
*Various options

http://iblogbox.com/chrome/useragent

And this extension allows you to find all HTTP URLs. (URL sniffer feature)
This extension supports Chrome 18 and later.
